txt.en: 'This is a new day for Shagâna. For the first time in generations we Shagâni can control our own destiny. We have much to be thankful for. I have much to be thankful for. Please, join me in talking with the others. You have earned your place among us.'
Speak with Mizâdi in Dun Shûma when you are ready

'Finally, this is a gift for you, [placeholder]. You have been my steadfast friend and compatriot through all the events over these past several weeks, and for that I am eternally grateful.\n\n'You will always have a welcome place in my halls, and in Shagâna, for everything you've done for her people, and for me. Thank you.'
Mizâdi, Girhâzi, Rahâzi, Amalíbi, and Numûru have gathered outside Dun Shûma to discuss their victory and what is next for Shagâna.
'Let us meet with the others, before they all scatter to the winds and return to their homelands. This is a moment we need to remember, and cherish.'
Speak with Mizâdi in Dun Shûma when you are ready.
Speak with Mizâdi in Dun Shûma.
Speak with Mizâdi in Dun Shûma
